00048 /**
00049  * @brief Class for computing hilo qc metric from a cel set of cel files.
00050  */
00051 class MultiChannelNonOverlapCelListener : public ChipSummary, public CelListener {

00068   /**
00069    * Get the names for the pair of cel files that have been seen.
00070    * @return - vector of cel file names, one for each cel file in order seen.
00071    */
00072   std::vector<std::string> getCelNames() {
00073     return m_CelNames;
00074   }
00075

00085   void addProbeMask(const std::string &name, const std::vector<bool> &mask);
00086   
00087   /**
00088    * Loop through the probesets provided and calculate a contrast value
00089    * for each one using the median of PM probes for A allele and B
00090    * allele. (CES constrast space)
00091    * @param cel - Cel File to get data from.
00092    * @param chrXProbeSets - Probesets to process (should be chrX non-pseudo autosomal).
00093    * @param contrastValues - Contrast values vector to be filled in.
00094    */
00095   static void fillInContrastValues(int celIx,
00096                                    std::vector<ProbeListPacked> &probeSets,
00097                                    std::vector<double> &contrastValues,
00098                                    double k = 2);
00099   
00100   /**
00101    * Go thru GC contrast values and find the mean and stdev
00102    * go thru AT contrast values and count how many are within 2stdev of GC mean
00103    * calculate the fraction of non-overlap
00104    * @param ATcontrast Values
00105    * @param GCcontrast Values
00106    * @param GCstats vector to fill in with stats
00107    */
00108   double calcNonOverlap( const std::vector<double> &ATcontrastValues,
00109                          const std::vector<double> &GCcontrastValues,
00110                          CumulativeStats<double>  &GCstats);
00111   
00112 
00113   /**
00114    * Go thru one channel's contrast values and calculate the fraction 
00115    * of probesets above or under given threshold.
00116    * @param contrastValues for a given channel
00117    * @param threshold to decide boundary
00118    * @para greater count probeset greater than threshold or not
00119    */
00120   double calcCrossThreshold(const std::vector<double> &contrastValues,
00121                             double threshold, 
00122                             bool greater = true );
00123   
00124   
00125   /**
00126    * calculate average_log_diff and log_diff_score (average_log_diff/log_diff_stdev)
00127    * @para logdiffvalues for one group
00128    * @para avg average_log_diff
00129    * @para score log_diff_score
00130    * @para IQRS  inter quantile range
00131    **/
00132   void calcLogDiff (std::vector<double> &logdiffValues, 
00133                     double &avg, 
00134                     double &score,
00135                     double &IQRS);
00136   
00137   /**
00138    * calculate average_log_diff and log_diff_score (average_log_diff/log_diff_stdev)
00139    * @para logdiffvalues for one group
00140    * @para score log_diff_score
00141    **/
00142   void calcLogDiff (std::vector<double> &logdiffValues, 
00143                     double &score);
00144   
00145   /**
00146    * Go thru GC contrast values and find the median and IQR
00147    * go thru AT contrast values and find the median and IQR
00148    * calculate the abs(GC_median - AT_median) / average_IQR 
00149    * @param ATcontrast Values
00150    * @param GCcontrast Values
00151    */
00152   double calcMedianDiff(const std::vector<double> &ATcontrastValues,
00153                         const std::vector<double> &GCcontrastValues,
00154                         CumulativeStats<double> &ATstats,
00155                         CumulativeStats<double> &GCstats);

00158                        vector<double> &summaryValues,
00159                        SparseMart& dMart,
00160                        std::vector<ChipStream *>* iTrans,
00161                        PmAdjuster& pmAdjust,
00162                        QuantMethod* quantMethod,
00163                        bool lowPrecision);

00169                      std::vector<double> &GCLogDiffValues,

00171                                          std::vector<double> &GCSaturationValues,
00172                      double k);

00187   QCProbesetOptions m_psOpts;
00188   ChipLayout* m_layout;
00189   std::vector<std::string> m_CelNames;
